title: Symphony of Dreams
description: Most of us ache for the opportunity to shine at the gift we're born with. Symphony Weber wants to give hers back. As an overweight kid, she longs to be like everybody else, so when the dreams about the stranger begin, she keeps them to herself. However, her growing intuitive abilities are not so easy to hide. Symphony discovers she must share knowledge, give warnings, and take on responsibilities that further complicate her life. Soon, her secret leaks. As a teenager, she stumbles over a way to make herself more normal. But there is a price. Years later, when a childhood nightmare returns to collect, she must fight to regain the gift she has always considered a curse.
author: Cynthia Rogan
